Package controlPanel

This package contains the functionality for the Control Panel, it supports the configuration of users, billboards and schedules. It communicates with the server to update the database according to the user inputs via the GUI.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGenericView
    Abstract Generic View is designed to provide all generic functionality extended by all views excluding LogInView and BBFullPreview.
    AbstractListView
    Abstract List View is designed to create the main structure for displaying the User and Billboard data in a scrollable list.
    AbstractUserView
    Abstract User View is designed with the key features for displaying with User data including username, permissions and password.
    AbstractView
    Abstract View defines the generic style of the application, abstract methods in which child classes are required to extend and frame set up common to all views.
    BBCreateView
    BB Create View is designed to allow users to create a Billboard by selecting the billboard name, title, text and picture.
    BBFullPreview
    Preview the full Billboard from the BBCreateView or the BBListView, this shows the Billboard as it would be on the Viewer.
    BBListView
    List of Billboards allowing user with valid permissions to Edit, Delete or View billboards.
    BBMenuView
    Menu for navigating to the Billboard list or Billboard create/update view.
    BillboardControl
    The BillboardControl contains on the communication methods between the Control Panel to the server for Billboard Methods.
    Controller
    Controller Class is designed to manage user inputs appropriately, sending requests to the Control Classes and updating the model and GUI views when required.
    HomeView
    Home view to allow users to navigate to all areas of the application including Users, Billboard and Schedule menus.
    LogInView
    Log In View to allow users to log in with their username and password.
    Main
    Main starts up the application by instantiating the Model, Views and Controller.
    Model
    Model class contains all data that persists during a session.
    ScheduleControl
    The ScheduleControl contains on the communication methods between the Control Panel to the server for Schedule Methods.
    ScheduleMenuView
    Menu View to allow users to navigate to the schedule week calendar view or create/update schedule view.
    ScheduleUpdateView
    Schedule Create View allows users to select an existing billboard and create or update the schedule.
    ScheduleWeekView
    Schedule Week View to view the weekly schedule of billboards.
    UserControl
    The UserControl contains on the communication methods between the Control Panel to the server for User Methods.
    UserCreateView
    User Create View is designed to allow users to create new User accounts.
    UserEditView
    User Edit View is designed to allow users to edit user accounts (assuming valid permissions).
    UserListView
    User List View displays a list of all users in the database displaying buttons to Edit, Delete or View the user.
    UserPreviewView
    User Preview View displays a read only view of user information including the username and permissions selected.
    UserProfileView
    User Profile View allows the current user to view personal information.
    UsersMenuView
    Menu View to allow the users to navigate to the user list view create user view.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BBCreateView.PhotoType
    Type of photo provided by user either url or data
    Main.VIEW_TYPE
    Enums representing GUI views in the application.
